              margin: 0;

              #hs-form-virality-container {
                border-radius: 10px;
              }
            }

            @media only screen and (max-width: 430px) {
              main {
                padding: 0;
              }
              #main [data-hsfc-id=Step], #main [data-hsfc-id=Banner] {
                border-radius: 0;
              }
            }
